price: Tena nini kitakacho kujuulisha Siku ya Malipo ni siku gani?
arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
footnotes: Tena ni nini kitacho kujuvya ni nini hiyo Siku ya Malipo kwa vitisho vyake na shida zake?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmu al-dīni
